parameter.name: kmeans_centers
parameter.title: Number of clusters
parameter.description: The value of k: the number of clusters.

parameter.name: kmeans_iter_max
parameter.title: Max. iteration
parameter.description: A larger number of iterations will take longer, but will be more likely to converge on a better solution.

parameter.name: kmeans_algorithm
parameter.title: Algorithm
parameter.description: The specific algorithm for the k-means method.

parameter.name: kmeans_number_of_random_start
parameter.title: Number of random start
parameter.description: Number of initially random cluster sets that the algorithm will attempt to refine. A larger number will take longer, but be more likely to converge on a better solution.
